title: [Large-Scale] Mental Health Simulation-Based Project Learning: Strengthening Integrated Care Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mental health concepts and foundational job-related communication skills
context.additional_context: Role-play learning based on real-world cases conducted in a simulation environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Applying professional communication skills with over 80% accuracy through interaction simulations with virtual patients with mental health issues
Implement the acquired care strategies in the workplace at least twice within four weeks after simulation learning
Measure learners' role-based contributions using a 3-level evaluation scale in team-based projects to enhance collaborative competencies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
